market_entry.name: PDI DOC Plugins
market_entry.description: Provides DOC steps for PDI : this plugin provides four different steps for PDI : one to modifie the metadata of a file (docx, odt and pdf), one to merge different PDF files into one, one to convert model to doc (OTT -> ODT, ODT -> ODT, DOCX -> DOCX) using JODReport and xDocReport engine and one to convert docx and odt file to pdf.
market_entry.author: Atol CD
market_entry.license_text: For more details about the GNU General Lesser Public License v3.0 see: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.html
market_entry.support_message: Supported by Atol Conseils et Développements
